Software Description: [KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is a signature backdoor used by [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) that is capable of process, file, and registry management. (Citation: FireEye APT32 May 2017)
Mitigation Description: Manage the creation, modification, use, and permissions associated to privileged accounts, including SYSTEM and root.
Application: Prevent credential overlap across systems of administrator and privileged accounts.
Use: [KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is capable of running WMI queries.

Software Description: [KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is a signature backdoor used by [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) that is capable of process, file, and registry management. (Citation: FireEye APT32 May 2017)
Mitigation Description: Manage the creation, modification, use, and permissions associated to user accounts.
Application: By default, only administrators are allowed to connect remotely using WMI. Restrict other users who are allowed to connect, or disallow all users to connect remotely to WMI.
Use: [KOMPROGO](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0156) is capable of running WMI queries.
